content: tape in the 270 yds for short-tail version middle of the row see diagram below 420 yds for long-tail version begin decreases as follows needles size 9 and size 10½ rs row knit to 1st marker ssk knit to 2 sts before gauge 15 sts = 4 in stockinette on smaller 2nd marker k2tog knit to end of row needles ws row knit to first marker purl to 2nd marker knit to or end of row materials bulky weight yarn continue in this manner until you have a total of 20 18 approx 108 yds per 100 grams sts remaining 170 yds for short-tail version switch to larger needles and work scarf section as 255 yds for long-tail version follows needles size 10 and size 11 for short-tail version work in garter stitch for 10½ gauge 12 sts = 4 in stockinette on smaller for long-tail version work in garter stitch for 25 needles bind off all sts finishing some yarn options weave in loose ends heavy worsted mondial merino plus jamieson s soft shetland or chunky manos del uruguay lamb s pride worsted noro iro soho bulky tweed vamos blackberry ridge bulky abbreviations k = knit p = purl measure this line k2tog = knit 2 together st s = stitch es increase = increase pm = place marker ssk = slip 1 knitwise slip 1 purlwise insert left needle back through both sts and knit them together garter stitch = knit every row m1 = make 1 by lifting the horizontal strand lying between the st just worked and the next st and place it on the left needle then knit into the back of this loop short-tail version january 9 2003 long-tailversion
